sent.orig: Lift your legs. Teddy Bear. Lift your legs. Teddy Bear. Lift! Lift!
sent.trans: 把你的腿抬起来。玩具熊。把你的腿抬起来。玩具熊。抬起来！抬起来！

sent.orig: They will judge whether the lift is a "good lift" or a "no lift."
sent.trans: 他们得判定试举是“成功”还是“失败”。

sent.orig: HH-type pump for low concentrations of high-lift transport slurry or a concentration of high-lift low-abrasive slurry.
sent.trans: HH型泵适用于输送低浓度高扬程渣浆或高浓度低磨蚀的高扬程渣浆。

sent.orig: Air lift is one of the most prospective lift methods in deep sea polymetallic nodule mining.
sent.trans: 气力提升是大洋锰结核开采的主要扬矿方法之一。

sent.orig: SKI LIFT: Skiers used a lift to get to the Fichtelberg peak in Oberwiesenthal, Germany, Tuesday.
sent.trans: 滑雪缆车：滑雪者们周二在德国奥伯维森谷乘坐缆车前往费希特尔贝格山的顶峰。
